message.content:
cs.SE, cs.CR, cs.PL, cs.DC, cs.SY. 

The paper proposes a systematic framework for mutation testing for smart contracts on Ethereum, which is a software engineering task (cs.SE). The focus of the paper is on ensuring the correctness of smart contracts, which is related to security and cryptography (cs.CR). The paper also introduces novel mutation operators for Ethereum Smart Contracts, which is a programming languages task (cs.PL). The empirical study conducted in the paper involves evaluating the effectiveness of the proposed approach, which is a distributed computing task (cs.DC). Finally, the paper proposes a quality assurance technique for Ethereum Smart Contracts, which is a systems and control task (cs.SY).
